oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Christianna Margaretta Houseal Thomson
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Encased tintype of Christianna Margaretta Houseal Thomson, 1811-1875. Thomson was married to David Lyon Thomson of Beaufort, S. C. Together, they had eleven children, three of whom fought in the Civil War. See tsla124, tsla125, and tsla127 for images of her sons.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
